content.raw:
Hi,

I am testing walking on vrc task 2, and I noticed the foot could penetrate the height map, which is a serious issue for development. This is tested on drcsim 2.5, gazebo 1.7. I used the default gazebo simulation parameters, but I did changed the texture rendering. Some short pauses are added between footsteps to make symptoms more visible. 

Here are some videos, 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JJCM1J6zjIk
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hNGmeutAuec
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ra4s0gKMOvE

Thanks!
Siyuan
content.html:
Hi,

I am testing walking on vrc task 2, and I noticed the foot could penetrate the height map, which is a serious issue for development. This is tested on drcsim 2.5, gazebo 1.7. I used the default gazebo simulation parameters, but I did changed the texture rendering. Some short pauses are added between footsteps to make symptoms more visible.

Here are some videos, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JJCM1J6zjIk http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hNGmeutAuec http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ra4s0gKMOvE

Thanks! Siyuan
